name: Site measure completed - Opening size correct
Waterproofing in place where applicable (i.e rebate)
Window is setout correctly as per plan (comment if not setout per plan).
All waterproofing and priming has been completed by SEM & Others where required
Window subframe has been installed in correct RL & is level and plumb
Window subframe bolts & dam ends are completely sealed.
Window subframe perimeter is caulked as per drawings
Flood testing completed to window subsill
Windows installed in correct place & fixed off as required.
All thresholds, filler pieces and coverplates are installed without damage
Flyscreen hardware installed and flyscreen operation is good
All dents, scratches and the like fixed, no damage to aluminium or glass present
